author: Michael Morrow
text:
Does your jurisdiction maintain landscaping within road rights of way, including road shoulders,  and medians? 
If yes, is the cost to maintain the landscaping reimbursed and what is your process for reimbursement (annual invoice to neighboring development, land development regulations, through annual tax bill, MSTU, or some other method)? 
Any comments or information would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Mike Morrow
Operations Director
City of Palm Beach Gardens FL
title: Landscape Maintenance within Road Rights of Way
